name: Rheumatoid Relief Program
description: A comprehensive integrative medicine program designed to help patients manage rheumatoid arthritis through consciousness healing, information medicine, and evidence-based holistic approaches.

syllabusSections.name: Understanding Rheumatoid Arthritis
syllabusSections.description: Comprehensive overview of RA pathophysiology and conventional treatments

syllabusSections.name: Consciousness Healing Techniques
syllabusSections.description: Introduction to consciousness-based healing approaches for autoimmune conditions

syllabusSections.name: Information Medicine Applications
syllabusSections.description: Practical applications of information medicine in rheumatoid arthritis management

syllabusSections.name: Lifestyle and Nutrition
syllabusSections.description: Holistic lifestyle modifications and anti-inflammatory nutrition strategies
